function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air purification","Impact":"Increased spread of infection","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air purification methods","Technologies":"HVAC systems, HEPA filters, UV-C light","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Architects, engineers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of natural ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of sick building syndrome and allergies","Mitigation":"Incorporating natural ventilation methods into architectural design","Technologies":"Passive ventilation, building orientation and layout","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Architects, urban designers"}]}
